gun.description: The gun in the center of the screen that the player fires by holding the left mouse button.

on_fire_pressed.description: Called when the player presses the left mouse button.

on_fire_held.description: Called when the player holds the left mouse button.

get_milliseconds_since_spawn.description: Gets the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since this entity was spawned.

get_muzzle_x.description: Gets the X coordinate of the gun's muzzle.

get_muzzle_y.description: Gets the Y coordinate of the gun's muzzle.
